title: `spack buildcache` doesn't generate `index.json` automatically
body:
<!-- Explain, in a clear and concise way, the command you ran and the result you were trying to achieve.
Example: "I ran `spack find` to list all the installed packages and ..." -->

I have created a build cache for software to be installed on several different systems, all of which are compatible with x86_64. `spack buildcache install` worked with v0.14, now it's broken on both develop and v0.15 branches.

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ git checkout develop
$ spack buildchache list --allarch glib
==> 1 cached build.
-- linux-rhel7-x86_64 / gcc@7.3.1 -------------------------------
glib@2.64.3
$ spack arch
linux-rhel7-sandybridge
$ spack buildcache install "glib arch=linux-rhel7-x86_64"
==> buildcache spec(s) matching glib arch=linux-rhel7-x86_64 

==> Error: glib arch=linux-rhel7-x86_64 does not match any downloaded packages.
==> Error: use one of the matching specs above
```

I get a different error message with v0.15:
```console
$ spack buildcache install "glib arch=linux-rhel7-x86_64"
==> Error: Failed to read index https://spack-llnl-mirror.s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/build_cache/index.json
==> Error: Can't recreate arch for spec linux-rhel6-x86_64 on current arch linux-rhel7-sandybridge; spec architecture is too different
```


It works fine with v0.14:
```console
$ git checkout releases/v0.14 
Switched to branch 'releases/v0.14'
Your branch is up to date with 'origin/releases/v0.14'.
$ spack buildcache install "glib arch=linux-rhel7-x86_64"
==> Finding buildcaches at https://spack-llnl-mirror.s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/build_cache
==> Finding buildcaches in /home/vagrant/mirror/build_cache
==> buildcache spec(s) matching glib arch=linux-rhel7-x86_64 

==> Installing buildcache for dependency spec...
```


### Information on your system

<!-- Please include the output of `spack debug report` -->

* **Spack:** 0.15.3
* **Python:** 3.6.8
* **Platform:** linux-rhel7-sandybridge
